title.text: Planning Referential Acts for Animated Presentation Agents

abstractContent.text: E l i s ab e t h A n d r E , Th om a s R i st Ge rm a

datasetContent.text: We have argued that the use a life-like character enables the realization of more effective referring expressions.
To empirically validate this hypothesis, we are currently embarking on a study of the user's reference resolution processes with and without the Persona.
